summary: Harvest ores instantly, with no animation (like alchemy ingredients). Makes no changes to the items you receive, and includes a version that removes the need to carry a pickaxe.
descriptionHtml:
Ugh. Mining.
Tap. Tap. Tap. (Ore) Tap. Tap. Tap ...
Infuriating.


This mod makes ore veins give up their contents immediately upon being activated, with no animation.
The resources given are completely unchanged (3 ores, plus some chance of gems).

The No Tools version additionally removes the requirement that the player be carrying a pickaxe.


Works fine with Dragonborn (Stahlrim etc.) and Hearthfire (Clay and Stone).

Compatible with any mod that does not change the mining script (e.g. compatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/193/]Glowing Ore Veins[/url]).
Includes the fixes added by the Unofficial Skyrim Patch.


This mod is also available on the Steam Workshop:
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=355918824]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=355918824[/url]

Also check out my other mods:
